root_cause: Faulty coolant hose clamp from supplier batch B2022-Q3
corrective_action: Replace coolant hose clamp with updated part P-CLM-002
preventive_action: Updated quality inspection protocol for incoming hose clamps
manufacturing_feedback: Supplier notified, new batch specifications implemented

root_cause: Battery cells from supplier X showing early capacity loss in high-temperature regions
corrective_action: Proactive battery replacement for affected vehicles in warranty
preventive_action: Changed battery supplier, implemented thermal testing in hot climate simulation
manufacturing_feedback: Design team evaluating enhanced thermal management for battery compartment

root_cause: Brake pad compound formula issue causing accelerated wear in city driving conditions
corrective_action: Replace with updated brake pad compound BP-2024-A
preventive_action: New brake pad validation includes extended city driving test cycle
manufacturing_feedback: Brake supplier updated compound formula, new pads in production from April 2024

root_cause: Compressor bearing failure due to insufficient lubrication in high-usage scenarios
corrective_action: Replace AC compressor, update refrigerant fill procedure
preventive_action: Enhanced compressor design with improved bearing lubrication system
manufacturing_feedback: New compressor model with upgraded bearings deployed from March 2024

root_cause: Seal degradation in struts exposed to extreme temperature variations
corrective_action: Replace front struts with updated sealing design
preventive_action: Improved seal material specification for all struts in production
manufacturing_feedback: New seal compound deployed, extended durability testing added to QA

root_cause: Oil level sensor calibration drift over time
preventive_action: Updated sensor firmware with auto-calibration feature
manufacturing_feedback: Sensor supplier implementing firmware update, rollout planned Q1 2025

root_cause: Factory wheel alignment tolerance too wide, causing premature inner edge wear
corrective_action: Perform wheel alignment at first service
preventive_action: Tightened factory alignment tolerance from ±0.5° to ±0.2°
manufacturing_feedback: Assembly line alignment equipment recalibrated, new tolerance in effect
